about_the_game:
Gather various resources, farm fertile lands, and reap bountiful harvests. Build settlements that grow from small villages to grand cities, expanding your civilization and bringing prosperity to your people. Face challenges head-on to survive; overcome the trials of nature and time to strengthen your kingdom

        

                                           

Starting with just a few essential resources, step into untouched lands and establish your first village. Use your land wisely by farming, raising livestock, and providing your villagers with the resources they need to prosper. Meet the daily needs of your people and ensure their safety to bring peace and harmony to your village.

Over time, expand your village by building new homes, workplaces, and storage facilities. Establish trade routes to nearby villages to strengthen your economy. Attract skilled artisans and craftsmen to diversify production and create a stronger community. Face challenges such as climate changes, disease outbreaks, and food shortages, keeping the morale of your people high.

Develop your leadership skills to grow your village every day, transforming it into a thriving community. Once you are strong and prosperous enough, you can elevate your village into a city and lay the foundations of a grand civilization.

                         

Stand firm against the enemies that threaten your lands and people! Be prepared for the dangers that lie ahead, and plan your battle strategies carefully. Strengthen your army, complete the training of your warriors, and equip them with the best weapons and armor. Learn your enemies' weaknesses, turn the battlefield to your advantage, and strike at the right moment to secure victory.

Capture strategic points, establish defensive lines, and safeguard your borders. Don’t just focus on attacking; build strong walls to protect your village and people, set up watchtowers, and be prepared for any advance from your enemies.

From time to time, you will face enemy commanders and engage in large-scale battles. With every clever move, you will earn victories and gain the trust and respect of your people.

Every victory will make you stronger, while every defeat will teach you valuable lessons. Overcome your enemies not just with physical strength, but also with intelligence and strategy. Arm yourself with your sword, hear the battle cries, and win the victory for your people!

Gather various resources, farm fertile lands, and reap bountiful harvests. Build settlements that grow from small villages to grand cities, expanding your civilization and bringing prosperity to your people. Face challenges head-on to survive; overcome the trials of nature and time to strengthen your kingdom

Meet the daily needs of your people and ensure their safety to bring peace and harmony to your village.

Over time, expand your village by building new homes, workplaces, and storage facilities. Establish trade routes to nearby villages to strengthen your economy. Attract skilled artisans and craftsmen to diversify production and create a stronger community. Face challenges such as climate changes, disease outbreaks, and food shortages, keeping the morale of your people high.

Develop your leadership skills to grow your village every day, transforming it into a thriving community. Once you are strong and prosperous enough, you can elevate your village into a city and lay the foundations of a grand civilization.

From time to time, you will face enemy commanders and engage in large-scale battles. With every clever move, you will earn victories and gain the trust and respect of your people.

name: Medieval Laws Elvan Rising

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-540 Processor or AMD® Ryzen 3 1200 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 2 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 470 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7400 Processor or AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Try to survive for honor and glory as Elvan in the medieval world. Build cities, gather your men, construct castles, and follow the main story. While exploring the open world, focus on uncovering the mysteries and dangers that await. Survive and uncover the secrets of the past.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
